mapper.sql: id, classroom_name, classroom_size, classroom_address, classroom_type, classroom_describe, creater_user, school_id
mapper.update:
update
set classroom_name=#{classroom_name}, classroom_size=#{classroom_size}, classroom_address=#{classroom_address}, classroom_type=#{classroom_type}, classroom_describe=#{classroom_describe}, school_id=#{school_id} where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select c.id, c.classroom_name, c.classroom_size, c.classroom_address, c.classroom_type, c.classroom_describe, c.creater_user, c.school_id, s.name school_name, (SELECT sum(DATEDIFF(mi, start_time, end_time)) / 60 FROM dbo.edu_schedule_details AS sd where sd.classroom_id =c.id ) weekTime from as c INNER JOIN edu_school s ON c.school_id = s.id where c.is_del = 1 and c.school_id in
'${item}'
and ( c.classroom_name LIKE ('%'+#{pd.keywords}+'%') or c.school_name LIKE ('%'+#{pd.keywords}+'%') )
